subject: F1 25 Support
description_text: I mainly play F1 25. The latest SIMSONN Manager update mentions an update for F1 25, but I can't configure it. The accelerator and brake aren't working. Are there any other steps I need to take to get it working? I have the Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals.

conversations.body_text: Hi Hakan AKCA,    You can refer to this post â€” it confirms that the feature is supported.     https://www.reddit.com/r/simracing/comments/1nj93bq/simsonn_plus_x_pedals_setup_guide_in_f1_25/
